Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Huerto Del Cura in Elche, you'll be minutes from Huerto del Cura and close to Santa Maria Basilica. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Altamira Palace and Palmeral of Elche.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 81 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a sauna, and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and an arcade/game room.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, where you can take in a garden view and dine alfresco (weather permitting). Or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, where you can take in a garden view and dine alfresco (weather permitting). Or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Huerto del Cura - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Santa Maria Basilica - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Altamira Palace - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Palmeral of Elche - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Estadio Manuel Martinez Valero - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Alenda Golf Course - 10.7 km / 6.7 mi
Pola Amusement Park - 12.7 km / 7.9 mi
Gran Playa - 13.2 km / 8.2 mi
Wholesale Food Market - 14.2 km / 8.8 mi
Castillo Fortaleza - 14.3 km / 8.9 mi
Municipal Aquarium of Santa Pola - 14.4 km / 9 mi
Arenales Beach - 15.1 km / 9.4 mi
Carabassi Beach - 15.6 km / 9.7 mi
Puerta de Alicante Shopping Center - 17.4 km / 10.8 mi
Guardamar Castle - 19.3 km / 12 mi

The preferred airport for Huerto Del Cura is Alicante (ALC-Alicante Intl.) - 12 km / 7.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Huerto Del Cura is Alicante (ALC-Alicante Intl.) - 12.1 km / 7.5 mi.
